About

Hi I am Bir Singh Jangra! I have 1.5+ years of experience in web technologies for building scalable web applications. I have the ability to design and build responsive frontend using Angular and React. Hands-on experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Typescript, Python, Responsive Design, Node JS, Express JS. Ability to pick up and adapt to new technologies quickly and deal with an ever-changing baseline

My Projects

Let's have a glance over some of my works....

1 / 4

Google Search Clone

A Google Search clone application made on Angular. It is used to search for any query just like the google appilcation, and also produces the same results as it uses google search engine API for getting the results.

Google Search clone is built using - Angular, Material-UI, Context-API, Javascript - HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

2 / 4

To Do App


ToDo App is simple and awesome app to organize your tasks with very easy to use interface. ToDo can help you to make list of your tasks to be reviwed at any time. We believe that we only focus on our Today and Tomorrow tasks, which is most important. So we made user interface like that so that it can give you a quick view on your day timeline.

Functions : - Add your task as a list. - Add unlimited Categories to organize your work - Modify your Task Heading / Descriptions - Share it with other friends / Family. - Check your Done tasks and you can restore them back or delete permanently.

ToDo App is built using - Angular, Javascript - HTML, CSS, Bootstrap
3 / 4

KharchaBook

Tracking your spending is often the first step in getting your finances in order. By understanding what you spend money on and how much you spend, you can see exactly where your cash is going and areas where you can cut back.It’s easy to make this part of your everyday routine thanks to expense tracker apps that help you manage your money on the go.



KharchaBook App is built using - Javascript - HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

4 / 4

Weather Forecast

The Weather Forecast App is a web application that provides real-time weather information. The application allows users to view the current weather conditions of any city worldwide by simply entering the city's name. Additionally, users can access a 5-day forecast to plan their activities accordingly. This project showcases my proficiency in frontend development with React, backend development using Node.js, and API integration to provide real-time weather data. It demonstrates my ability to create user-friendly and interactive applications that fetch and display relevant information dynamically based on user input.

Weather Forecast Website is built using - React, Redux, NodeJs, Javascript - HTML, CSS, Bootstrap
